p: A single outbreak can be caused by multiple NoVs genotypes ( Table 3). GII.17 and GI.6 were responsible for outbreak I; GII.17 and GI.3 for outbreak III; and GII.3 and GI.6 for outbreak V. For outbreak X, GI.5 was detected in both human specimens and water specimens (well water and household tap water). The well water was the standard water supply for residential district H, and contamination of this water was believed to have caused outbreak X.
